meanings.definition: Measured or recorded in terms of time.
meanings.sent1: The timed test lasted for one hour.
meanings.sent2: The timed race started promptly at 9 AM.
meanings.sent3: The timed baking competition was a race against the clock.
meanings.sent4: Her timed response was as quick as a flash of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The timed schedule kept everyone on track.

meanings.definition: Coordinated or adjusted to occur at a specific time.
meanings.sent1: The timed fireworks display lit up the sky at midnight.
meanings.sent2: The timed release of the movie was synchronized with the star's birthday.
meanings.sent3: The timed surprise party caught him completely off guard.
meanings.sent4: Her timed entrance onto the stage was like a perfectly choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The timed arrival of the train was right on schedule.

meanings.definition: Determined or limited by a specific time frame.
meanings.sent1: The timed offer expired at midnight.
meanings.sent2: The timed deadline for submissions was strict.
meanings.sent3: The timed curfew for teenagers caused some grumbling.
meanings.sent4: His timed opportunity was slipping away like sand through his fingers.
meanings.sent5: The timed event had a clear start and end point.
